mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_attention WHERE DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(create_time) and attention_label = #{userid};

SELECT IFNULL( b.id, '' ) `id`, IFNULL( b.`name`, '' ) `name`, IFNULL( b.area, '' ) area, IFNULL(a.attention_type,'')type FROM t_office_building b LEFT JOIN t_attention a ON b.id = a.attention_label LEFT JOIN a_user u ON u.user_id = a.attention_user WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.attention_type != 'C' AND a.attention_user = #{id}
and b.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')

SELECT IFNULL( t.attention_id, '' ) id, IFNULL( u.user_name, '' ) username, IFNULL( u.phone, '' ) phone, IFNULL( u.head, '' ) head, IFNULL( u.user_id, '' ) userid FROM t_attention t LEFT JOIN a_user u ON u.user_id = t.attention_user WHERE t.attention_label = #{id} AND t.attention_type = #{type}

(SELECT IFNULL(t.attention_label,'')id, IFNULL(b.`name`,'')`name`, IFNULL(b.picture,'')picture, IFNULL( t.attention_type, '' ) type FROM t_attention t LEFT JOIN t_office_building b ON b.id = t.attention_label WHERE t.attention_type = 'A' AND t.attention_user = #{id}) UNION all (SELECT IFNULL(t.attention_label,'')id, IFNULL(b.`name`,'')`name`, IFNULL(b.picture,'')picture,
IFNULL( t.attention_type, '' ) type FROM t_attention t LEFT JOIN t_shared_office b ON b.id = t.attention_label WHERE t.attention_type = 'B' AND t.attention_user = #{id});
